entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:25 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -39.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 04:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -39.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -43.4°C
Wind: WSW 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 50 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 51 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
